Title: Mind-blowing purchase
Review: The machine I bought is about one month old now. No major concerns. We Installed it ourselves as we did not want anyone coming home because of covid19. It is good for a family of four people. Very large things may be difficult to wash in this and it would be better to opt for larger size. Even though it is manufactured in China. Bosch seems to have maintained strict vigilance on quality. Flipkart did an excellent job of delivering the product.
